channel.title: Minimal Blog
channel.description: A minimal, elegant blog built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

item.title: The CEO of One: How to Lead an AI Workforce (Before Your Boss Does)
item.description: The real threat isn't AI replacing youâ€”it's becoming the person who doesn't use AI while someone younger and hungrier builds an army of digital interns.

item.title: Everything You Know About AI Is Already Obsolete
item.description: The uncomfortable truth - if you are just using AI to do tasks, you are competing on price against a machine that costs pennies to run. You will lose.

item.title: The Sovereign Brain - Why the Future of AI Must Be Local
item.description: If we want AI to truly augment human potential, we have to break the tether to the cloud. We need to run these models locally, on our own devices.

item.title: We Shape Our Tools, and Thereafter Our Tools Shape Us
item.description: Every time an AI agent moves a file for you or edits your config, you're not just skipping the boring work. You're skipping the comprehension.
